name: Cribtastic – Cribbage Board
description:
A modern take on the classic cribbage board design. Made to make cribbage scoring quick and accurate both at home and on the go, a pack of cards is all you need to start playing!

Quick-Scoring
- Drag the pin to score the full range of possible points in one smooth motion
- Tap the pin to quickly score lower-value hands
- Drag the pin back to subtract accidentally overscored points

Beautiful Interface
- Designed to look great in light and dark modes
- Optimized to allow both players to peg points conveniently
- Game progress track shows numeric score when tapped

Privacy Conscious
- Cribtastic does not collect, store, rent, or sell your location, device, or any other personal data
- No ads means no creepy ad networks tracking your every move
